title: Emergency Medicine
description: Comprehensive care for life-threatening conditions. Our ER is equipped for critical situations 24/7/365.

title: Pediatric Care
description: Specialized, gentle emergency treatment for infants, children, and teens in a comforting environment.

title: Trauma & Injury
description: Advanced treatment for fractures, deep cuts, burns, and other acute physical injuries requiring immediate attention.

title: Diagnostic Imaging
description: State-of-the-art on-site CT scans, digital X-rays, and ultrasounds for rapid and accurate diagnosis.

title: Medical Director
bio: Board-Certified in Emergency Medicine with over 15 years of experience leading trauma teams in high-volume hospitals.

title: Lead Physician

title: ER Physician
bio: Expert in rapid diagnostics and trauma stabilization with a strong focus on compassionate care for families.

quote: I was seen immediately. The staff was incredibly professional and caring during a stressful time. Cleanest facility I've ever been to.

content.headline: Expert Medical Care,
content.subtitle: Immediate board-certified attention for adults and children. Skip the crowded ER and get treated with dignity and speed at ER of White Rock.

content.title: ER of White Rock vs. Urgent Care
Why Choose ER of White Rock?
content.subtitle: We redefine emergency care by putting the patient first, combining speed, expertise, and advanced technology.

features.title: No Wait Times
features.description: Experience immediate triage and bedside care. We value your time and prioritize getting you seen by a doctor the moment you arrive.

features.title: Board-Certified Care
features.description: Our facility is staffed exclusively by ER-trained physicians and nurses who are experts in emergency medicine and trauma care.

features.title: Advanced Technology
features.description: Equipped with on-site CT scans, digital X-rays, ultrasounds, and a full-service laboratory for rapid and accurate diagnosis.

content.title: Meet Our Experts
content.subtitle: Our team is led by board-certified emergency physicians committed to providing the highest standard of care.

content.title: Visit ER of White Rock Today
content.text: We are open 24/7/365 to serve you with immediate, expert care.
